p: Antioxidant activities of the leaves in terms of DPPH, ABTS and H 2O 2 radical scavenging activities and total reduction ability are shown in Figures 6Aâ€“D, while the half maximal inhibitory concentrations (IC 50) values of the free radical scavenging activities of the leaves and RS part are shown in Figures 6E,F. The regression graphs of both the RS and leave extracts are shown in Supplementary Figure S2. The IC 50 values indicate that the plant polar extracts are very good radical scavengers and quite comparable with the standard ascorbic acid.
